ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] IIRC (OT) then Pixie (OnT) then Formula 1 (OT again )
ygData.msgSnippet: Q: Who needs rez when you have screech? A: Whoever else happens to be unlucky enough to be in the dungeon when you fire it off and all those mobs run into the
ygData.messageBody:
Q: Who needs rez when you have screech?
A: Whoever else happens to be unlucky enough to be in the dungeon when you
fire it off
and all those mobs run into the room they had secreted themselves away
in.

>I've been using it in Kaesora as an interrupt against Strathebone
>Healers (I think they're around 30-33, it's a guess) and at 40 I get
>about a 1/3 - 1/5 resist rate depending on cha and luck (low cha of
>119, high cha of 134). I could comfortably hold one and interrupt
>heals when it was just a 43 pallie and myself but the addition of
>anything else and we would have to book for zone. Who needs rez when
>you have screech?

--- Gordon Hughes <ghughes@...> wrote:
